thread.section_title: The Paper Factory Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very "art deco" styled hotel
thread.title_full: Very "art deco" styled hotel - Review of The Paper Factory Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: shazzamate
title: Very "art deco" styled hotel
text:
Set in Long Island city this hotel has been carefully refurbished into a boutique style hotel.. as soon as we walked in we felt at home and loved the way it had been updated... Especially the red phone box in the foyer...
The subway station was just at the end of the street too so very convenient to get into manhattan and back again..
only negative was that the restaurant "Mundo" was quite expensive and not a great deal of choice, so we decided not to eat there but see what else we could find close by.. overall though a great hotel...
